data.name: label67.Text
data.value: 2. If the only change to light curve data is the truncation in one or more light curves, the main Light curve file will not be updated when the Edit form is closed unless the green Main light curves... button has been clicked for at least one of the light curves that have been edited.

data.name: label61.Text
data.value: 1. When you click 'Update && close' , the light curve data for the event will be updated. This means that if you so not want to make these changes, but you save the Main file because of other changes, it will be updated with those changes, unless you use the menu item: Integration... Undo binning before editing another entry.

data.name: label62.Text
data.value: 2. If the only change to light curve data is the integration in one or more light curves, the main Light curve file will not be updated when the Edit form is closed unless the green Main light curves... button has been clicked for at least one of the light curves that have been edited.

data.name: label69.Text
data.value: 1. When you click 'Update && close' , the light curve data for the event will be updated. This means that if you so not want to make these changes, but you save the Main file because of other changes, it will be updated with those changes, unless you use the menu item: Trucationion... Undo truncation before editing another entry.
